title: Favorite win condition
body:
I want to know from as many people as possible what condition you love most to give you an enjoyable match. 

In relation to number 6 that is if you have a troll comp or something with a 5 man and manage to 
win from that (e.g. 5 jg, all assassin comp)

Edit: Rito you are very welcome to use this as stats if you want, maybe someone who has access can chuck this on all the boards around the world :)

replies.body: imo the best wins are when the teams are neck and neck and the enemy pulls off a wombo combo and you interupt and counter wombo them and end from that in a huge comedic and dramatic laggy 4fps teamfight.
Backdooring is my favourite way to win - the opponent just doesn't like it when you pull it off :/
Im all for lasting till late game and then winning a few or one big team fights when death timers are a big deal.
Just winning is enough for me

I'd have to say that comebacks are 100% best wins ever. especially if you got rekt in laning phase and the enemy were giving you trash about being bad but they just didn't understand that you had a late game team comp and as they cower in fear of your 1300 dmg Jhin crits, you just laugh in their face as you take that 50g from the nexus, typing into chat: gg ez.
